translation: $RELIGION$ 该角色不能入赘婚姻

original: Cannot give away the capital county after moving the capital
translation: 迁都后不能放弃首都省份

original: Cannot revoke this granted title before §Y$DATE$§!
translation: 不能在§Y$DATE$§!前收回该头衔！
为教会而战
不是入赘婚姻
是入赘婚姻
是最近授予的
不是最近授予的
真信者

original: Cannot give theocracies more than one duchy or kingdom
translation: 不能给予神权政体超过一个公国或王国的土地
废黜了对立教宗
废黜了对立教宗

original: This Casus Belli can be used to depose an antipope in another realm.
translation: 其他国家能使用这个宣战理由废黜对立教宗
废黜对立教宗
$FIRST_ADJ$—$SECOND_ADJ$对立教宗之战
拥立对立君主
$FIRST_ADJ$—$SECOND_ADJ$拥立对立君主之战
§R一位对立教宗最近被废黜了§!
§R不是 $RELIGION$§!
对立君主[From.GetFirstName]
[This.GetName]的对立君主[From.GetFirstName]

original: Members seek to restore Papal authority in [This.GetName] by installing §Y[From.GetBestName]§! on the throne, deposing any antipope and passing the Papal Investiture law.
translation: 成员希望通过拥立§Y[From.GetBestName]§!获得权位、废黜所有国内的对立教宗以及通过教宗神职叙任权，以重建教宗在[This.GetName]的权威。
要求王位

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the throne, the overthrow of antipopes and the institution of Papal Investiture. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求君主推翻对立教宗并推行教宗神职叙任权。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝接受，你的派系会发起一场叛乱。

original:
Your shameful backing of a false Pope must end now. The Holy Father has agreed that the throne of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] should pass to me so that the realm can be brought back into the true [From.Religion.GetName] fold. Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. The righteous stand behind me!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你对一个敌教宗的可耻的支持必须立刻结束。教宗大人已经同意将[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的王位授予给我，以便这个国家可以回到[From.Religion.GetName]的怀抱。服从这个请求，要不然后果自负。正义正站在我背后！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to relinquish the throne to me. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意将王位让给我。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from the papally sanctioned Antiking Faction, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to relinquish the throne.
translation: 在已受教宗加冕的对立君主派系的压力之下，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意放弃王位。

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and relinquish the throne. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并放弃皇位。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
宗教领袖战争盟友

original: §RYou must be independent to create an antipope§!
translation: §R你必须要独立才能扶植对立教宗§!
巴尔科赫巴卫兵
战场地形大师

original: This character has mastered the craft of finding the perfect terrain for defensive battles.
translation: 这个角色能够完美的利用有利地形进行防御战斗。
狭窄阵线

original: Not possible to Usurp County Rank Titles!
translation: 无法篡夺伯爵级的头衔！

original: What have I become? No more steak for me.
translation: 我成为了什么？不要告诉我。

original: The realm has benefitted from the vast network of contacts that [From.GetTitledName], your Jewish [Root.GetMyChancellorName], has fostered abroad. Somehow [From.GetSheHe] always manages to keep up to date on new customs and the latest diplomatic developments.
translation: 王国受益于 [From.GetTitledName]——你的犹太人 [Root.GetChancellorName]——在王国外建立的庞大社交网络。不知何故[From.GetSheHe]总能适应新风俗以及新的外交形式。
做得好。

original: [From.GetTitledName], your [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], has several contacts among the Radhanites. This Jewish merchant network supposedly stretches across the entirety of the known world, from Western Europe all the way to distant Cathay, and these contacts have been a great boon to the development of the realm's economy.
translation: 你的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName][From.GetTitledName]和拉特纳犹太人有些关系。犹太商人的商业网延伸到整个已知世界，由西欧到遥远的中国，这些网络极大的发展了国家的经济。

original: Your [Root.GetMySpymasterName], [From.GetTitledName], seems to have friends and informants inside every Jewish community in Europe. Messenger pigeons arrive at [From.GetHerHis] abode on a daily basis, often carrying vital intelligence from abroad about new weapons and tactics.
translation: 你的[Root.GetSpymasterName]，[From.GetTitledName]，似乎在在欧洲的每个犹太社区中都有朋友和关系。信鸽每天都会到达[From.GetHerHis]住所，带来由外国传入关于新武器和技术的重要情报。

original: Jewish councillors will sometimes benefit the advancement of technology.
translation: 犹太裔的内阁成员有时有利于发明新科技
认可婚约

original: The Cathar, or Albigensian, heresy rejects confession and the holiness of the clergy and of the Pope. They only have a single sacrament - the Consolation - to remove sin and turn the believer into a Cathar 'Perfect'.
translation: 清洁派或阿尔比派，异端拒绝承认神职人员和教宗的圣洁。他们只有唯独一个圣事——慰藉——除去邪恶，把信徒变成清洁派的「完美」教徒。

original: The Fraticelli, or 'Little Brethren', is a Catholic heresy that originated in the Fransiscan Order of monks. It is devoted to poverty and asceticism - especially for men of the cloth. Fraticelli heretics are violently opposed to Church wealth and displays of opulence.
translation: Fraticelli，或「小兄弟会」，是一个天主教异端，起源于僧侣的方济各兄弟会。它致力于贫困和禁欲主义——尤其是对穿着奢靡的人。小兄弟会异端用暴力反对教会的财富和对富裕的炫耀。

original: Bogomilism is an originally Orthodox Christian heresy with Gnostic elements that completely rejects the ecclesiastical hierarchy and advocates a return to early Christianity. Bogomilists believe that the world was created by an evil demiurge - the Devil.
translation: 波格米勒派是东正教的原教旨主义异端，参杂了诺斯替教的元素，完全拒绝教会等级制，主张回归到早期基督教。波格米勒教徒认为，世界是由一个邪恶的德缪哥——魔鬼创造的。

original: The Iconoclast heresy plagued the Byzantine Empire in multiple waves. Iconoclasts believe that religious images - icons and depictions of holy figures in particular - are a form of idolatry and must not be allowed. In their heyday, iconoclasts destroyed innumerable such decorations and icons, sometimes even urged on by Iconoclast Emperors.
translation: 圣像破坏异端在多次浪潮中困扰着拜占庭帝国。他们认为，宗教图像——图标和神圣人物的特别描绘，是偶像崇拜的一种形式，是不能被允许的。在他们的全盛时期，曾摧毁无数这样的装饰和图标，反对圣像崇拜的皇帝有时甚至会鼓励他们这样做。

original: The Yazidi religion is properly a distinct religion but is treated as a Sunni heresy in the game. Yazidis believe that God created the world and left seven angels in charge, the chief of whom is the Peacock Angel, Malek Taus or Shaytan, a being usually identified by Christians and Muslims as Satan.
translation: 雅兹迪教派事实上是一个完全独立的宗教，但在游戏中被视为逊尼派异端。雅兹迪教派相信上帝创造了世界，并留给主管世界的七位天使，他们的首领是孔雀天使，Malek Taus 或衰旦，他通常被基督教徒和穆斯林认为是撒旦。

original: Ibadism is distinct from both Shi'a and Sunni Islam. Ibadis believe that souls condemned to Hell will stay there forever. Ibadis also reject the notion that Muslims will get to see Allah on the Day of Judgment.
translation: 伊巴德派与什叶派和逊尼派不同。伊巴德派认为，受罚入地狱的灵魂将永远待在地狱。伊巴德派也拒绝承认穆斯林会在审判日看到安拉的概念。

original: The Hurufi faith is a mystical, kabbalistic, Sufi sect within Islam, regarded as a heresy.
translation: 胡儒非信仰是伊斯兰内一种神秘主义、卡巴拉、苏菲式的教派，被视为异端。

original: Karaite Judaism is a Jewish movement characterized by the recognition of the Tanakh alone as its supreme legal authority in Jewish religious law and theology. In this it is distinct from mainstream Rabbinic Judaism. Karaites maintain that all of the divine commandments handed down to Moses by God were recorded in the written Torah, without additional Oral Law or explanation. In-game, Karaite Judaism is a heresy of mainstream Judaism. This heresy has no formal head and no special game mechanics.
translation: 圣经派犹太教是一个犹太教运动，以只承认塔纳赫为犹太教法和神学的最高律法权威为特点。因此它与主流拉比犹太教完全不同。圣经派认为，所有摩西传下的神的诫命都被记录在书面托拉中，没有额外的口述法律或解释。在游戏中，圣经派是主流犹太教的异端。这个异端没有正式领袖也没有特别的游戏机制。

original: Samaritanism is an Abrahamic religion closely related to Judaism. Samaritans assert their worship is the true religion of the ancient Israelites prior to the Babylonian Exile, preserved by those who remained in the Land of Israel, as opposed to Judaism, which they assert is a related but altered and amended religion. In-game, Samaritanism is treated as a heresy of mainstream Judaism. This heresy has no formal head and no special game mechanics.
translation: 撒马利亚派是与犹太教密切相关的亚伯拉罕宗教。撒玛利亚教徒声称他们的崇拜就是流徙巴比伦之前古以色列人的真宗教，由那些留在以色列之地的人保存至今，与犹太教正相反，他们确信犹太教是与自己有关联但被扭曲和修改了的宗教。在游戏中，撒马利亚派被当做犹太教的异端。这个异端没有正式的宗教领袖和特别游戏的机制。
枢机
预期的下一位枢机

original: This bishop is probably next in line for a Cardinalship when one becomes available.
translation: 当枢机出现空缺之时，这位主教将成为候补。
我最好的候补枢机

original: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Cardinal by the Pope.
translation: 王国内的所有主教中，这位主教是最有可能被教宗任命为枢机的。
着重于精通防御地形。
着重于围攻战术。
建立伊巴德派哈里发头衔

original: Create the Ibadi Caliphate and assume your position as spiritual leader of all true Ibadi Muslims.
translation: 建立伊巴德派哈里发头衔并确立你在伊巴德派穆斯林中精神领袖地位。
§R不支持§!
